definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: The voice of bridegroom and bride will never be heard in you again.
sentences.chinese: 新郎和新妇的声音，在你中间决不能再听见。

sentences.english: And the Spirit and the bride say, Come.
How fair is thy love, my sister, my spouse!
sentences.chinese: 我妹子，我新妇，你的爱情何其美。

sentences.english: That's the bridal love to You.
For the wedding of the Lamb has come, and his bride has made herself ready.
sentences.chinese: 因为羔羊婚娶的时候到了，新妇也自己预备好了。

sentences.english: Today's Nephila species are found around the globe in tropical and sub-tropical regions.
sentences.chinese: 现代的络新妇分布在全球的热带和亚热带地区。

sentences.english: On the second daytime, reception the rules bride and adore tea for the elders.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，按规矩新妇要给长辈们敬茶。

sentences.english: God the lover does not desire to share His bride with anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 一个深爱其新妇的上帝不愿意将她与别人分享。

sentences.english: Though he holds in his arms the earthbride, the sky is ever immensely away.
sentences.chinese: 虽然天空想把大地新妇拥进臂弯，但它依然无限遥远。

sentences.english: Thou hast ravished my heart, my sister, my spouse;
sentences.chinese: 我妹子，我新妇，你夺了我的心。

definition: first return of bride to her parental home
ritual kneeling to heaven and earth by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/same as 拜天地
to send the betrothal gifts/(fig.) to conclude a marriage
bridal room and ornamented candles/wedding festivities (idiom)
part of the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经/a song/a poem set to elegant music/a refined chant/the biblical Song of Solomon
(literary) (of a married woman) to visit one's parents
